data.title: Woody Harrelson: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Woody Harrelson: Check out the list of all Woody Harrelson movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Woody Harrelson news on Times of India.
data.text:
Woody Harrelson says he doesn't own a cellphone: Don't like to be readily available at any time

PTI / Jun 24, 2024, 11:54 (IST)

Woody Harrelson gave up using a cellphone around three-and-a-half years ago due to growing addiction, as revealed on his podcast with Ted Danson.

2024 Golden Globes: Jennifer Lawrence's playful antics before Emma Stones' Best Actress win, leaves the internet in splits

etimes.in / Jan 08, 2024, 12:00 (IST)

Jennifer Lawrence injected humor at the 2024 Golden Globes, joking about winning the award. Emma Stone won for ‘Poor Things’ while Lawrence playfully exclaimed, "Mother!" Stone also earned a nomination for ‘The Curse.’ Stone and Lawrence's camaraderie goes back years, with Woody Harrelson playing a pivotal role in fostering their friendship. Harrelson worked with Stone in ‘Zombieland’ and later collaborated with Lawrence on the ‘Hunger Games’ movies.

'Back to the Future' star Michael J. Fox accepts honorary Oscar for Parkinson's advocacy

Reuters / Nov 20, 2022, 14:21 (IST)

Actor Michael J. Fox, who charmed audiences in 1980s TV comedy "Family Ties" and the "Back to the Future" movies, received an honorary Oscar on Saturday for advocacy work that has raised $1.5 billion for research into Parkinson's disease.

Ruben Fleischer to direct 'Now You See Me 3'

PTI / Sep 30, 2022, 11:49 (IST)

Filmmaker Ruben Fleischer has been tapped to direct the third installment in the 'Now You See Me' franchise. According to the reports, Lionsgate Motion Picture Group president Nathan Kahane announced the new film, which will be penned by screenwriter Seth Grahame-Smith.

Woody Harrelson, Laura Linney to lead drama movie 'Suncoast'

PTI / Aug 19, 2022, 18:26 (IST)

Oscar-nominated actors Woody Harrelson and Laura Linney will take on the lead roles in the upcoming drama 'Suncoast'. The project, which made the 2020 Black List, will mark the directorial debut of Laura Chinn, best known for creating the popular sitcom 'Florida Girls'.

Woody Harrelson writes hilarious poem for his baby doppelganger

IANS / Aug 07, 2022, 14:03 (IST)

Not everyone is lucky enough to get a poem written by 'True Detectives' star Woody Harrelson in their name. Interestingly, a toddler named Cora has managed to achieve the same.

South African model Charlbi Dean dies at 32

AP / Sep 01, 2022, 09:36 (IST)

Charlbi Dean, the South African actor and model who had a breakout role in “Triangle of Sadness,” which won this year’s top prize at the Cannes Film Festival, has died at age 32.

Xiaomi has a revenue 'problem' in India and China, here's why

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Aug 19, 2022, 17:18 (IST)

Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi Corp has posted a steep drop in second quarter revenue as the world's biggest smartphone market shrank, hit by strict Covid restrictions. The company's trouble seems to be both in India and its home country, China. Overall, Xiaomi registered around a 20 percent drop in its global sales at $10.31 billion in the June quarter (Q2).

Kenya Barris to write and direct 'Wizard of Oz' reboot

PTI / Aug 16, 2022, 11:58 (IST)

'Black-ish' creator Kenya Barris has been roped in to write and direct their upcoming reimagining of fantasy classic Wizard of Oz". According to the reports, the film will be a modern version of the iconic musical featuring Judy Garland.

Woody Harrelson in talks to join cast of yacht rock musical 'Sailing'

ANI / Jul 16, 2022, 14:19 (IST)

Three-time Oscar nominee Woody Harrelson, who received a positive response for his work as Cletus Kasady in 'Venom: Let There Be Carnage', is currently in negotiations to join Lionsgate's ensemble 1970s jukebox musical 'Sailing' from 'Rock of Ages' creator Chris D'Arienzo. The project is billed as a bunch of musicians in the late 1970s as they discover the smooth sounds and smoother lifestyle that is yacht rock, the soft rock music genre that took over FM radio during that era.

Jodie Foster to star in her first big TV role as adult in 'True Detective 4'

IANS / May 27, 2022, 17:58 (IST)

The fourth instalment of the anthology crime-drama series 'True Detective' will see Jodie Foster in her first major television role as an adult, reports a portal. As per a portal, 'The Silence of the Lambs' star, who will also executive produce the series, will play Detective Liz Danvers, which comes from writer and director Issa Lopez and executive producer Barry Jenkins. Alan Page Arriaga, executive producer of Starz's Shining Girls, has also joined Lopez to write.

Woody Harrelson, Simu Liu to lead thriller film 'Last Breath'

PTI / May 07, 2022, 12:26 (IST)

Hollywood stars Woody Harrelson, Simu Liu, and Djimon Hounsou are set to feature in a fact-based narrative thriller film. Titled 'Last Breath', the film will be directed by Alex Parkinson, who had co-directed with Richard da Costa the 2019 documentary of the same title that informs the film, according to the reports.

'SNL' opens Season 47 with former Trump impersonator debuting as Biden

IANS / Oct 04, 2021, 21:21 (IST)

The 47th season of "Saturday Night Live", the late-night comedy sketch and variety show aired on the US television network NBC, opened with comedian James Austin Johnson, previously famous for his Donald Trump impersonations, making his debut as Joe Biden, reports the source.

'Venom: Let There Be Carnage' smashes pandemic records with USD 90.1 million debut at box office

AP / Oct 04, 2021, 18:34 (IST)

Pandemic moviegoing is finally starting to look like pre-pandemic moviegoing. Sony Pictures' Marvel sequel 'Venom: Let There Be Carnage' blew away expectations to debut with $90.1 million in ticket sales, making it easily the best opening of the pandemic, according to studio estimates Sunday.
